White has achieved his goal: to come to an endgame with the two Bishops
against Knights. From a theoretical point of view the win of the two Bishops
is not a dogma but... the practice, strangely, favors it.

Zugzwang! The black King has not many
possibilities to maneuver, a move of the Nd7 would allow white to checkmate,
and a move of the Nc7 would allow the maneuver Bg4-e6-f7.
